1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Reporting abort reasons.
4
5--  Text
6--
7--    ABORTED  (main reason)
8--    -------- --------------------------------------------
9--    Detail   (detailed reason)
10--             (detailed reason)
11--    Source   (line #) (col #) (filename)
12--             > (line text)
13--             (line #) (col #) (filename)
14--             > (line text)
15--    Command  koshu
16--             (arg 1)
17--             (arg 2)
18
19module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Report
20  ( CommandLine,
21    abort, abortPrint,
22    abortMessage, bug,
23  ) where
24
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO            as B
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List          as B
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude       as B
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text          as B
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Reason  as B
31
32
33-- | Command name and its arguments.
34type CommandLine = [String]
35
36-- | Stop program execution abnormally.
37abort :: CommandLine -> B.AbortReason -> IO x
38abort cmd a =
39  do abortPrint cmd a
40     B.putCommentLines ["Exit with status 2", ""]
41     B.exitWith $ B.ExitFailure 2
42
43-- | Print abort message.
44abortPrint :: CommandLine -> B.AbortReason -> IO ()
45abortPrint cmd a = B.putCommentLines $ abortMessage cmd a
46
47-- | Convert abort reason to message lines.
48abortMessage :: CommandLine -> B.AbortReason -> [String]
49abortMessage cmd a = B.squeezeEmptyLines $ map O.trimEnd texts where
50    texts  = sandwich "" "" $ B.renderTable " " tab ++ note
51    tab    = B.alignTable $ title : rule : rows
52    title  = [ B.textCell B.Front "ABORTED "
53             , B.textCell B.Front $ B.abortReason a ]
54    rule   = [r, r, r]
55    r      = B.textRuleCell '-'
56    p text = (text, "")
57    rows   = concatMap row
58             [ ("Detail"  , map p  $ B.abortDetail a)
59             , ("Source"  , source $ B.abortPoint a)
60             , ("Command" , map p  $ cmd)
61             ]
62
63    note = case B.abortNote a of
64             n | n == []   -> []
65               | otherwise -> "" : "Note" : "" : map ("  " ++) n
66
67    row :: (String, [(String, String)]) -> [[B.Cell]]
68    row (_, []) = []
69    row (name, xs)
70        = let (codes, tags) = unzip xs
71          in [[ B.textCell      B.Front name
72              , B.textBlockCell B.Front codes
73              , B.textBlockCell B.Front $ map dots tags ]]
74
75    dots :: O.StringMap
76    dots ""   = ""
77    dots text = ".. " ++ text
78
79    sandwich :: a -> a -> O.Map [a]
80    sandwich open close xs = open : xs ++ [close]
81
82source :: [(String, B.CodePt)] -> [(String, String)]
83source = concatMap B.codePtDisplay . B.unique . reverse
84
85-- | Stop on error @'BUG DISCOVERED'@
86bug :: String -> a
87bug msg = error $ "BUG DISCOVERED: " ++ msg
88
